code: import React from"react";import{useFormik}from"formik";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){var formik=useFormik({initialValues:{email:"",password:""},onSubmit:function onSubmit(values){if(values.email&&values.password){var emailRegex=/^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;if(emailRegex.test(values.email)){alert("Login Successful");}else{document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML="Username should be an email";}}else{if(!values.email){document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML="Field required";}if(!values.password){document.getElementById("pswError").innerHTML="Field required";}}}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:formik.handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold underline",children:"Hello world!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"emailField",children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"emailField",name:"email",type:"email",onChange:formik.handleChange,value:formik.values.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"emailError"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"pswField",children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"pswField",name:"password",type:"password",onChange:formik.handleChange,value:formik.values.password}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"pswError"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"submitBtn",type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]});}export default App;
